text: I think this is a wonderful step to take
after an undergrad if you're interested
in potentially doing a doctoral program
maybe you're not sure maybe you know but
you just want more experience I think
this is a wonderful position I really
gotten experience in all aspects of the
research process and I think I am much
better off for it in entering a doctoral
program I think I have really gained a
lot of skills and a lot of knowledge
that will serve me better this RA
position has been a really fantastic fit
for me
HBS puts a lot of focus on looking at
your profile and your interests and in
matching you with professors with
similar interests and research
methodology and I learned a lot about
the work they're doing how they conduct
research but also what it means to be an
academic when I started my RA position
here I very quickly learned about
different resources different courses
they are offering but also research
seminars or workshops where I can obtain
the skills I am interested in the people
who come here that you could just get to
you get invited to lunches you get
invited to interviews get to be a fly on
the wall as the movers and shakers of
the business world talk about the issues
they're facing some of the qualms they
have they ask for advice and and you get
to hear it all the things that don't
necessarily make it into the news and it
all it all starts here this experience
has definitely helped clarify my
interests what I like about economics
and finance and it's also shown me that
my interests are not necessarily fixed
so they really grow and evolve with the
environment I'm in so it's definitely
motivated me to pursue further study I
am very interested in pursuing a PhD
after a disposition and so this RA
position has been really instrumental in
getting me a strong PhD applicant
profile and helping me
to get into a great ph.d program down
